text: Mauro Brandoni (born December 19, 1984 in Buenos Aires, Argentina) is an Argentine footballer currently playing for Provincial Osorno of the Tercera División in Chile. ==Teams== * Sportivo Patria 2006-2007 * Independiente José Terán 2008-2009 * Atlético Luján 2010 * Provincial Osorno 2010–present ==External links== * Profile at BDFA * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine footballers Category:Provincial Osorno footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Chile Category:Expatriate footballers in Ecuador Category:Argentine expatriate sportspeople in Chile Category:Argentine expatriate sportspeople in Ecuador Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Mauro Brandoni
